name: PseudoexfoliationSyndrome
title: Pseudoexfoliation Syndrome
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of pseudoexfoliation syndrome.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of pseudoexfoliation of lens or pseudoexfoliation glaucoma.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to 'unspecified eye.')
